artefact: Report a lost or stolen Blue Badge

artefact.overview: Report your lost or stolen Blue Badge and get a replacement
artefact.introduction: You'll fill out your details and choose your local council. If the badge was stolen, you'll need to give a crime reference number. Your council will check your application before they send you a replacement badge.
